snippet: The Chinese Embassy said 10 of its nationals had gone missing from a camp near the Nigerian border and the identity of the assailants was unknown, but it noted that the area had seen frequent attacks by Boko Haram.
abstract: The Chinese Embassy said 10 of its nationals had gone missing from a camp near the Nigerian border and the identity of the assailants was unknown, but it noted that the area had seen frequent attacks by Boko Haram.

headline.main: Boko Haram Suspected in Attack on Chinese Workers in Cameroon
